alert.note: Alert for Kittson; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Kittson and west central Roseau Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Lancaster, or 44 miles west of Roseau, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lancaster around 735 PM CDT. Lake Bronson around 755 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
